mapper.sql:
where 1=1
and c.customerid like concat('%', #{condition.customerid},'%')
and c.sku like concat('%', #{condition.sku},'%')
and c.lotatt12 like concat('%', #{condition.lotatt12},'%')
and s.descr_c like concat('%', #{condition.skudescrc},'%')
and c.lotatt04 like concat('%', #{condition.lotatt04},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM doc_asn_details a LEFT JOIN doc_asn_header aa ON aa.asnno=a.asnno LEFT JOIN doc_pa_details b ON aa.`asnno` = b.`asnno` AND a.asnlineno = b.ASNLINENO LEFT JOIN `inv_lot_att` e ON e.`lotnum`=b.`lotnum` WHERE aa.asnstatus='99'

SELECT count(1) FROM `doc_order_details` a LEFT JOIN `doc_order_header` aa ON aa.orderno=a.`orderno` LEFT JOIN `act_allocation_details` b ON b.`orderno`=a.`orderno` AND b.`orderlineno`=a.`orderlineno` LEFT JOIN `inv_lot_att` e ON e.`lotnum`=b.`lotnum` WHERE aa.sostatus='99'

SELECT aa.`asnno` documentNo,DATE_FORMAT(e.`lotatt03`,'%Y-%m-%d') asndate,bb1.codename_c documentType,a.`customerid`,a.`sku`,e.`lotatt12`, s.`descr_c` descrc,b.PUTWAYQTY_COMPLETED asnqty,bb.codename_c uom,e.`lotatt04`,e.`lotatt05`,aa.`notes`,p.`qty1` FROM doc_asn_details a LEFT JOIN doc_asn_header aa ON aa.asnno=a.asnno LEFT JOIN doc_pa_details b ON aa.`asnno` = b.`asnno` AND a.asnlineno = b.ASNLINENO LEFT JOIN `inv_lot_att` e ON e.`lotnum`=b.`lotnum` LEFT JOIN `bas_sku` s ON s.`sku`=a.`sku` AND s.`customerid`=a.`customerid` LEFT JOIN `bas_package` p ON s.`packid`=p.`packid` LEFT JOIN `bas_customer` r ON s.`customerid`=r.`customerid` LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM `bas_codes` WHERE codeid='uom') bb ON s.defaultreceivinguom=bb.code LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM bas_codes WHERE codeid='ASN_TYP') bb1 ON bb1.code=aa.asntype WHERE aa.asnstatus='99'
${limitClause}

SELECT count(1) FROM doc_asn_details a LEFT JOIN doc_asn_header aa ON aa.asnno=a.asnno LEFT JOIN doc_pa_details b ON aa.`asnno` = b.`asnno` AND a.asnlineno = b.ASNLINENO LEFT JOIN `inv_lot_att` e ON e.`lotnum`=b.`lotnum` WHERE aa.asnstatus='99'

SELECT aa.`asnno` documentNo,DATE_FORMAT(e.`lotatt03`,'%Y-%m-%d') asndate,bb1.codename_c documentType,a.`customerid`,a.`sku`,e.`lotatt12`, s.`descr_c` descrc,d.qcqty_expected asnqty,bb.codename_c uom,e.`lotatt04`,aa.`notes`,p.`qty1` FROM doc_asn_details a LEFT JOIN doc_asn_header aa ON aa.asnno=a.asnno LEFT JOIN `doc_pa_header` dph ON dph.`ASNNO` = aa.`asnno` LEFT JOIN doc_pa_details b ON dph.`PANO` = b.`PANO` AND a.asnlineno = b.ASNLINENO LEFT JOIN doc_qc_header c ON dph.PANO = c.pano LEFT JOIN doc_qc_details d ON d.qcno = c.qcno AND IFNULL(b.userdefine3, '') = IFNULL(d.userdefine3, '') AND IFNULL(b.userdefine4, '') = IFNULL(d.userdefine4, '') LEFT JOIN `inv_lot_att` e ON e.`lotnum`=d.`lotnum` LEFT JOIN `bas_sku` s ON s.`sku`=a.`sku` AND s.`customerid`=a.`customerid` LEFT JOIN `bas_package` p ON s.`packid`=p.`packid` LEFT JOIN `bas_customer` r ON s.`customerid`=r.`customerid` LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM `bas_codes` WHERE codeid='uom') bb ON s.defaultreceivinguom=bb.code LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM bas_codes WHERE codeid='ASN_TYP') bb1 ON bb1.code=aa.asntype WHERE aa.asnstatus='99'
${limitClause}

select count(1) FROM doc_asn_details a LEFT JOIN doc_asn_header aa ON aa.asnno=a.asnno LEFT JOIN `doc_pa_header` dph ON dph.`ASNNO` = aa.`asnno` LEFT JOIN doc_pa_details b ON dph.`PANO` = b.`PANO` AND a.asnlineno = b.ASNLINENO LEFT JOIN doc_qc_header c ON dph.PANO = c.pano LEFT JOIN doc_qc_details d ON d.qcno = c.qcno AND IFNULL(b.userdefine3, '') = IFNULL(d.userdefine3, '') AND IFNULL(b.userdefine4, '') = IFNULL(d.userdefine4, '') LEFT JOIN `inv_lot_att` e ON e.`lotnum`=d.`lotnum` LEFT JOIN `bas_sku` s ON s.`sku`=a.`sku` AND s.`customerid`=a.`customerid` LEFT JOIN `bas_package` p ON s.`packid`=p.`packid` LEFT JOIN `bas_customer` r ON s.`customerid`=r.`customerid` LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM `bas_codes` WHERE codeid='uom') bb ON s.defaultreceivinguom=bb.code LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM bas_codes WHERE codeid='ASN_TYP') bb1 ON bb1.code=aa.asntype WHERE aa.asnstatus='99'

SELECT c.lotatt14 sourceOrder,aa.soreference1 soOrderNum,aa.`orderno` soOrderNo,DATE_FORMAT(aa.`edittime`,'%Y-%m-%d') soDate,bb1.codename_c soType, a.`customerid`,a.`sku`,c.lotatt12,s.`descr_c` descrc,b.qty,bb.codename_c uom,c.lotatt04,DATE_FORMAT(c.`lotatt02`,'%Y-%m-%d') lotatt02, aa.addwho,aa.editwho reviewWho,aa.c_address4 trackingNumber,aa.consigneeid,p.qty1 FROM `doc_order_details` a LEFT JOIN `doc_order_header` aa ON aa.orderno=a.`orderno` LEFT JOIN `act_allocation_details` b ON b.`orderno`=a.`orderno` AND b.`orderlineno`=a.`orderlineno` LEFT JOIN `inv_lot_att` c ON c.`lotnum`=b.`lotnum` LEFT JOIN `bas_sku` s ON s.`sku`=b.`sku` AND s.`customerid`=b.`customerid` LEFT JOIN `bas_package` p ON s.`packid`=p.`packid` LEFT JOIN `bas_customer` r ON s.`customerid`=r.`customerid` LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM `bas_codes` WHERE codeid='uom') bb ON s.defaultreceivinguom=bb.code LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM bas_codes WHERE codeid='SO_TYP') bb1 ON bb1.code=aa.ordertype WHERE aa.sostatus='99'
${limitClause}

select count(1) FROM `doc_order_details` a LEFT JOIN `doc_order_header` aa ON aa.orderno=a.`orderno` LEFT JOIN `act_allocation_details` b ON b.`orderno`=a.`orderno` AND b.`orderlineno`=a.`orderlineno` LEFT JOIN `inv_lot_att` c ON c.`lotnum`=b.`lotnum` LEFT JOIN `bas_sku` s ON s.`sku`=b.`sku` AND s.`customerid`=b.`customerid` LEFT JOIN `bas_package` p ON s.`packid`=p.`packid` LEFT JOIN `bas_customer` r ON s.`customerid`=r.`customerid` LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM `bas_codes` WHERE codeid='uom') bb ON s.defaultreceivinguom=bb.code LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM bas_codes WHERE codeid='SO_TYP') bb1 ON bb1.code=aa.ordertype WHERE aa.sostatus='99'

select count(1) FROM doc_order_packing_carton c INNER JOIN `doc_order_packing_carton_info` info ON info.orderno=c.`orderno` AND info.`traceid`=c.`traceid` INNER JOIN `bas_customer` b ON b.`CUSTOMERID`=c.`customerid` INNER JOIN `bas_customer` bb ON bb.`CUSTOMERID`=c.`lotatt08` INNER JOIN `bas_sku` s ON c.`sku`=s.`sku` AND c.`customerid`=s.`customerid` INNER JOIN `bas_package` p ON s.`packid`=p.`packid` LEFT JOIN (select * from `bas_codes` where codeid='uom') bc ON s.defaultreceivinguom=bc.code
